elements.title: Marvel's Midnight Suns Legendary Edition
elements.description: Extend your adventure with the Marvel’s Midnight Suns Legendary Edition, including the Marvel’s Midnight Suns base game, the Marvel's Midnight Suns Season Pass, and 23 premium skins!

elements.title: Marvel's Midnight Suns - 1,500 Eclipse Credits
elements.description: Eclipse Credits are an in-game currency for Marvel’s Midnight Suns used to purchase premium cosmetic character skins via the in-game Marketplace.

elements.title: Marvel's Midnight Suns Season Pass
elements.description: The Season Pass includes four post-launch DLC packs, each introducing a new fully playable hero, new missions, new enemies, and more. Also includes 23 Premium Skins at launch so you can customize the look of the Midnight Suns team.

elements.title: Marvel's Midnight Suns - 300 Eclipse Credits
elements.description: Eclipse Credits are an in-game currency for Marvel’s Midnight Suns used to purchase premium cosmetic character skins via the in-game Marketplace.

elements.title: Marvel's Midnight Suns - 600 Eclipse Credits
elements.description: Eclipse Credits are an in-game currency for Marvel’s Midnight Suns used to purchase premium cosmetic character skins via the in-game Marketplace.

elements.title: Marvel's Midnight Suns Digital+ Edition
elements.description: Customize the look of your entire Super Hero lineup with the Marvel’s Midnight Suns Digital+ Edition, including Marvel’s Midnight Suns base game and 11 premium skins.

elements.title: Marvel's Midnight Suns - 1,200 Eclipse Credits
elements.description: Eclipse Credits are an in-game currency for Marvel’s Midnight Suns used to purchase premium cosmetic character skins via the in-game Marketplace.

elements.title: Marvel's Midnight Suns
elements.description: Confront the darker side of the Marvel universe in an all-new Tactical RPG featuring Iron Man, Wolverine, Captain America, Ghost Rider, Blade, and more.

elements.title: The Callisto Protocol - Digital Deluxe Edition
elements.description: The Digital Deluxe Edition includes: Retro Prisoner Character & Weapons Skin and the Season Pass.  Survive to escape the horrors of Callisto and uncover the dark secrets of Jupiter’s dead moon.

elements.title: The Callisto Protocol - Season Pass
elements.description: Jupiter’s dead moon isn’t finished with you yet. Enhance your experience with The Callisto Protocol’s Season Pass. The Season Pass includes: Outer Way Skin Collection, Contagion Bundle, Riot Bundle and Story DLC.

elements.title: The Callisto Protocol - Day One Edition
elements.description: The Day One Edition includes: Retro Prisoner Character & Weapons Skin. Survive to escape the horrors of Callisto and uncover the dark secrets of Jupiter’s dead moon.

elements.title: Saints Row IV Re-Elected
elements.description: You're the President now! The Saints have gone from the Penthouse to the White House - but Earth has been invaded and it’s up to you to save it with an arsenal of superpowers and strange weapons, in the wildest open world game ever.

elements.title: Blaze the Fire Elemental Familiar Pack
elements.description: Blaze the Fire Elemental Familiar Pack

elements.title: Action Figure Lucius Skin & Feat Pack
elements.description: This Idle Champions Skin & Feat pack contains a Champion unlock, 7 gold Champion Chests, and an exclusive skin & feat for that Champion! Take your game to the next level!

elements.title: Action Figure Warduke Theme Pack
elements.description: Theme packs contain a Champion unlock, chests, and an exclusive skin & feat for that Champion. They also contain a new familiar that you can assign to certain tasks, such as levelling up Champions, clicking the monsters, or using Ultimates!

elements.title: Action Figure Orkira Skin & Feat Pack
elements.description: This Idle Champions Skin & Feat pack contains a Champion unlock, 7 gold Champion Chests, and an exclusive skin & feat for that Champion! Take your game to the next level!

elements.title: MechWarrior 5: Mercenaries - Rise of Rasalhague
elements.description: In a conflict that pre-dates the formation of the Star League, Join Colonel Månsdottir and the people of Rasalhague in a fight for freedom and independence from the Great Houses, and discover the Crusader 'Mech, in a new 12-mission quest line.

elements.title: LEGO® Star Wars™: The Skywalker Saga Book of Boba Fett Character Pack
elements.description: Travel beyond Tatooine and through the Star Wars galaxy as LEGO-style bounty hunters and mercenaries with The Book Of Boba Fett character pack.

elements.title: LEGO® Star Wars™: The Skywalker Saga Andor Character Pack
elements.description: While others charge head on, Rebel spy Cassian Andor moves in stealth to topple the Empire. Play as characters from the new series Andor, in LEGO-style.

elements.title: Far Cry® 6 FREE Trial
elements.description: Try Far Cry® 6 for FREE.

elements.title: JWE2: Dominion Malta Expansion
elements.description: Set before the dramatic events of Universal Pictures and Amblin Entertainment’s Jurassic World Dominion, you’ll head to the warmth of the Mediterranean and attempt to manage multiple dinosaur facilities across three locations.

elements.title: RPG in a Box
elements.description: Bring your stories and ideas to life! RPG in a Box is an accessible game creation tool for making games and other interactive experiences in a fun and simple way.

elements.title: Thespian Yorven Skin & Feat Pack
elements.description: This Idle Champions Skin & Feat pack contains a Champion unlock, 7 gold Champion Chests, and an exclusive skin & feat for that Champion! Take your game to the next level!

elements.title: Golden Touch Quest Pack
elements.description: The femme fatale that fortune favored.  Includes Outfit, Back Bling, Pickaxe, Loading Screen and Quests to earn up to 1,500 V-Bucks

elements.title: Dead by Daylight - Forged in Fog Chapter
elements.description: Dead by Daylight’s Forged In Fog Chapter features a new Killer – The Knight – and a new Survivor, Vittorio Toscano. Purchasing this add-on unlocks an exclusive Cosmetic for Vittorio: Handsome Riding Jacket.

elements.title: Sand Patch Grade & CSX SD40
elements.description: Experience Sand Patch Grade in modern and powerful equipment and embark on new journeys with a classic twist in the Sand Patch Grade & CSX SD40 bundle!

elements.title: Köln - Aachen & S-Bahn BR 423
elements.description: Experience the Köln - Aachen route in ICE and Regional services and embark on new journeys featuring a S-Bahn traction with the Köln - Aachen & S-Bahn BR 423 bundle!

elements.title: Bakerloo Line & Silver 1972 Stock
elements.description: Experience the Bakerloo Line route in its entirety and embark on new journeys featuring a historic livery with the Bakerloo Line & Silver 1972 Stock bundle!

elements.title: DEATHLOOP + Ghostwire: Tokyo Bundle
elements.description: DEATHLOOP + Ghostwire: Tokyo Bundle

elements.title: Fall Guys - Otter Delights Pack
elements.description: They might not be great butlers, but who cares when they're this cute?

elements.title: Far Realm Kent Skin & Feat Pack
elements.description: This Idle Champions Skin & Feat pack contains a Champion unlock, 7 gold Champion Chests, and an exclusive skin & feat for that Champion! Take your game to the next level!

elements.title: Far Realm Virgil Skin & Feat Pack
elements.description: This Idle Champions Skin & Feat pack contains a Champion unlock, 7 gold Champion Chests, and an exclusive skin & feat for that Champion! Take your game to the next level!

elements.title: Far Realm Walnut Theme Pack
elements.description: Theme packs contain a Champion unlock, chests, and an exclusive skin & feat for that Champion. They also contain a new familiar that you can assign to certain tasks, such as levelling up Champions, clicking the monsters, or using Ultimates!

elements.title: Adventure Capital Pack
elements.description:
Get the Adventure Capital Pack, featuring:
 - Cosmetics for Anu, Octavio, and Fran 
 - 10,000 in-game currency
 - An in-game FL4K Vaultlander collectible

elements.title: Sackboy™: A Big Adventure - Football Costume
elements.description:
Kick off your wild celebrations for the Craftworld Cup!
Sackboy can wear whatever team colours you like – while also showing off his Keepy-Ups skills with his new emote.
Internet connection required to access downloadable content.

elements.title: theHunter: Call of the Wild™ - Seasoned Hunter Bundle
elements.description: Ready to Roam? Let’s go! With a wide array of weapons at your disposal, high-tech gear and your trusty hound at your side, the Seasoned Hunter Bundle has everything you need to survive and thrive in the wider world of theHunter: Call of the Wild.

elements.title: theHunter: Call of the Wild™ - Master Hunter Bundle
elements.description: You’ve outgrown your home territory – now the world’s your oyster! With the Master Hunter Bundle you’re ready for anything! From the frozen wilds of Medved-Taiga National Park to the plains of Vurhonga Savannah, your gear will carry you through.

elements.title: theHunter: Call of the Wild™ - Essentials DLC Bundle
elements.description: The Essentials DLC Bundle has everything a Hunter needs to get started. Take a spin in the ATV, head out on a hike with your faithful Bloodhound and brand-new rifle, and lay out your trophies for all to see at the Saseka Safari Trophy Lodge.

elements.title: theHunter: Call of the Wild™ - Greenhorn Bundle
elements.description: The Greenhorn Bundle is perfect for Hunters who are looking for a head-start on the hunting trail. Explore the reserves of theHunter: Call of the Wild in an ATV, get to know your faithful Bloodhound, and explore the variety of gear available.

elements.title: Marvel’s Spider-Man: Miles Morales
elements.description: Spider-Man. When a fierce power struggle threatens to destroy his home, Miles must take up the mantle of Spider-Man and own it.

elements.title: Predator: Hunting Grounds – Hunting Party DLC Bundle 2
elements.description: Become a relentless hunter with this DLC bundle featuring the Amazon Predator and Pirate Predator premium classes.

elements.title: Train Sim World® 3: Birmingham Starter Pack
elements.description: All aboard for Brum! Climb onto one of the most unique modern trains in Britain, delve into dense commuter operations and explore West Midlands territory, including the famed Lickey Incline. Bustling duties await in Train Sim World 3: Birmingham Starter Pack.

elements.title: Train Sim World 3: Birmingham Cross-City Line
elements.description: All aboard for Brum! Climb onto one of the most unique modern trains in Britain, delve into dense commuter operations and explore West Midlands territory, including the famed Lickey Incline. Bustling duties await in Train Sim World 3:Birmingham Cross-City Line

elements.title: Goat Simulator 3 - Digital Downgrade Edition
elements.description: Pilgor’s baaack! Gather your herd and venture forth into Goat Simulator 3; a totally realistic, sandbox farmyard experience. Invite up to three friends in local or online co-op, create carnage together, or compete in mini-games and then not be friends.

elements.title: Goat Simulator 3 - Digital Downgrade DLC
elements.description: The Digital Downgrade DLC brings unique remastered content from Goat Simulator DLC throughout history, and a couple of spicy new additions!

elements.title: Goat Simulator 3
elements.description: Pilgor’s baaack! Gather your herd and venture forth into Goat Simulator 3; a totally realistic, sandbox farmyard experience. Invite up to three friends in local or online co-op, create carnage together, or compete in mini-games and then not be friends.

elements.title: The Crew® 2 - Mazda RX-8 Pearl Edition Starter Pack
elements.description: Add the supercharged Mazda RX-8 Pearl Edition to your garage and get 45,000 Crew Credits to complete your collection!

elements.title: The Crew® 2 - Porsche Cayman GT4 Carbon Edition Starter Pack
elements.description: Unlock the uncompromising Porsche Cayman GT4 Carbon Edition and 45,000 Crew Credits to complete your collection!

elements.title: GigaBash - Godzilla 4 Kaiju Pack
elements.description: The ultimate kaiju crossover is here! The Godzilla DLC adds 4 new playable characters from the Godzilla universe, each with its own iconic abilities and unique movesets.

elements.title: Frozen Legends Pack
elements.description: Stay frosty this season with the Frozen Legends pack!

elements.title: Polar Legends Pack
elements.description: Put the competition on ice with the Polar legends pack.

elements.title: Sid Meier’s Civilization® VI: Leader Pass
elements.description: Rethink how you rule with the Civilization VI: Leader Pass! Discover new paths to world domination with 18 new leader selections. New content is available free for current and new owners of Civilization VI Anthology.

elements.title: LEGO® Star Wars™: The Skywalker Saga Rebels Character Pack
elements.description: Fight against the evil Galactic Empire and play through all nine films of the saga as resistance fighters from Star Wars: Rebels in LEGO style.

elements.title: LEGO® Star Wars™: The Skywalker Saga Obi-Wan Kenobi Character Pack
elements.description: Jedi Master Obi-Wan Kenobi has made himself quite a reputation with the Galactic Empire. Play as LEGO characters from the Obi-Wan Kenobi series.

elements.title: Brawlhalla Collectors pack
elements.description: An epic platform fighter for up to 8 players online or local. Try casual free-for-alls, ranked matches, or invite friends to a private room. And it's free! Play cross-platform with millions of players on PlayStation, Xbox, Nintendo Switch, iOS, Android & Steam! Frequent updates. Over fifty Legends.

elements.title: All Legends Pack
elements.description: Brawlhalla - All Legends (Current and Future)

elements.title: Brawlhalla
elements.description: An epic platform fighter for up to 8 players online or locally. Try casual free-for-alls, ranked matches, or invite friends to a private room. And it's free! Play cross-platform with millions of players on PlayStation, Xbox, Nintendo Switch, iOS, Android and Steam! Frequent updates. Over fifty Legends.

elements.title: Cities: Skylines - The Classics Bundle
elements.description: Get your hands on Cities: Skylines’ classical Expansions. Enjoy the nightlife in the City with After Dark, have fun in the snow with Snowfall and turn your City into a giant pedestrian area with Plazas & Promenades.

elements.title: Cities: Skylines - World Tour Bundle
elements.description: Get inspired by different regions around the world with Cities: Skylines “World Tour”. It includes 2 content creator packs and 2 radio stations: Content Creator Pack: Heart of Korea, Content Creator Pack: Skyscrapers, K-pop Station, 80's Downtown Beat.

elements.title: FS22 - Volvo T 425 Krabat
elements.description: A real classic - defined by compactness, power, and longevity: In Farming Simulator 22, the Volvo T 425 Krabat lives on, continuing its legacy on virtual fields.

elements.title: FS22 - Platinum Expansion
elements.description: Expand your farming business to the brand-new and lively environment of Silverrun Forest - and bring your new machines and tools by Volvo to the forest! Over 40 new authentic machines by various brands, new forestry missions, production chains and gameplay mechanics are included.

elements.title: Farming Simulator 22 - Platinum Edition
elements.description: FS22 - Platinum Edition

elements.title: Flapjack the Pirate Flumph Familiar Pack
elements.description: Familiar packs contain an exclusive familiar, as well as a collection of potions that can help you progress further and faster! Familiars are NPCs that you can assign to certain tasks, such as levelling up Champions, clicking the monsters, or using Ultimates.

elements.title: R-Type Final 2: Ace Pilot Special Training Pack III
elements.description: A DLC pack that contains the following resources: Solonium x9,000, Etherium x9,000, Bydogen x9,000, R-points x250,000, Arms Warranty Ticket x20, and Wave Acceleration Ticket x20

elements.title: R-Type Final 2: Ace Pilot Special Training Pack I
elements.description: A DLC pack that contains the following resources: Solonium x3,000, Etherium x3,000, Bydogen x3,000, R-points x30,000, Arms Warranty Ticket x5, and Wave Acceleration Ticket x5

elements.title: R-Type Final 2: New Pilot Support Pack
elements.description: A free DLC pack that contains the following resources: Solonium x1,800, Etherium x1,800, Bydogen x1,800, R-points x10,000, Arms Warranty Ticket x2, and Wave Acceleration Ticket x1

elements.title: R-Type Final 2: Ace Pilot Special Training Pack II
elements.description: A DLC pack that contains the following resources: Solonium x6,000, Etherium x6,000, Bydogen x6,000, R-points x100,000, Arms Warranty Ticket x12, and Wave Acceleration Ticket x12

elements.title: The Crew® – Standard Edition
elements.description: Explore the first realistic recreation of the entire USA ever built for a driving game in The Crew® Ultimate Edition, your all inclusive edition of the revolutionary action driving game The Crew®.
elements.developerDisplayName: Ivory Tower in collaboration with Ubisoft Reflections

elements.title: The Crew® – Ultimate Edition
elements.description: Explore the first realistic recreation of the entire USA ever built for a driving game in The Crew® Ultimate Edition, your all inclusive edition of the revolutionary action driving game The Crew®.
elements.developerDisplayName: Ivory Tower in collaboration with Ubisoft Reflections

elements.title: Pirates Outlaws
elements.description: A roguelike card game in which you navigate dangerous seas and challenge their masters.

elements.title: Fall Guys - Wildfire Pack
elements.description: Make your next round an ultimate knockout with these ringside rumblers! Bundle Includes: Wildfire (Whole Costume), Blunderdome Sports Live (Whole Costume), Bean Analyst (Whole Costume), and 2000 x Show-Bucks!

elements.title: Fall Guys - Starter Pack
elements.description: New to the Blunderdome? Grab two delectable costumes and 1000 Show-Bucks to start in style!

elements.title: Fall Guys - Neigh Neigh Pack
elements.description: Guaranteed to turn your next round into a one-horse race! Bundle Includes: Neigh Neigh (Whole Costume) and 600x Show-Bucks

elements.title: theHunter: Call of the Wild™ - New England Mountains
elements.description:
Welcome to New England Mountains!

Grab your gear and get ready to explore the majestic Appalachian Mountains! Pit your wits against a new Great One, discover three remastered animals, and check in with an old friend in this beautiful location.

elements.title: Prison Architect - Future Tech Pack
elements.description: Welcome Wardens! Only the world’s most ruthless Warden can contain the world’s most ruthless inmates. Design and develop your personalized penitentiary in Prison Architect.

elements.title: Steelrising - Cagliostro's Secrets
elements.description: Uncover the darkest secrets of the King's agent, the Comte de Cagliostro, and seek out the revolutionary Jacques Pierre Brissot.

elements.title: Dying Light 2 Stay Human: Bloody Ties
elements.description: Tempted by riches, fame, and status, Aiden enters a bloodsport tournament where the greatest combatants fight to the death. Face off against the worst of the worst, make new allies, climb up the ladder, and claim the title of the ultimate victor.

elements.title: Spelljammer Shaka Skin & Feat Pack
elements.description: This Idle Champions Skin & Feat pack contains a Champion unlock, 7 gold Champion Chests, and an exclusive skin & feat for that Champion! Take your game to the next level!

elements.title: Far Realm Strix Skin & Feat Pack
elements.description: This Idle Champions Skin & Feat pack contains a Champion unlock, 7 gold Champion Chests, and an exclusive skin & feat for that Champion! Take your game to the next level!

elements.title: Spelljammer Virgil Theme Pack
elements.description: Theme packs contain a Champion unlock, chests, and an exclusive skin & feat for that Champion. They also contain a new familiar that you can assign to certain tasks, such as levelling up Champions, clicking the monsters, or using Ultimates!

elements.title: Sackboy™: A Big Adventure - Freya Costume
elements.description:
Is it a falcon? An angry Valkyrie? Nae, it’s Freya!

Fashion Sackboy after this feisty goddess and Vex will not stand a chance. Extra kudos if you apply some magic to your sword with the new emote!

Internet connection required to access downloadable content.

elements.title: Sackboy™: A Big Adventure - Kratos Costume
elements.description:
Epic beard? Check. Angry scowl? Double check. The Leviathan axe? Now we’re talking! Sackboy’s ready for anything in his new Kratos Costume – don’t forget his cool Axe Throw emote either! 

Internet connection required to access downloadable content.

elements.title: Sackboy™: A Big Adventure - Atreus Costume
elements.description:
Feel like a god as Atreus arrives.

Don this new Costume as you search for the meaning behind “Loki”… or have a grand time sticking it to Vex!
Plus, witness his hunter instincts with the new emote.

Internet connection required to access downloadable content.

elements.title: HUMANKIND™ - Together We Rule Expansion Pack
elements.description: Unite HUMANKIND™ with the Together We Rule Expansion Pack! Features the Congress of Humankind, 1 new currency (Leverage), 1 new quarter unlocking new inter-empires actions (Embassy), 3 new units (Agent), 6 New Cultures with Diplomatic Affinity, and more...

elements.title: Deep Freeze Bundle
elements.description:
Includes a full set to be used in Battle Royale:

- 1000 V-Bucks
- Frostbite Outfit
- Freezing Point Back Bling
- Chill-Axe Pickaxe
- Cold Front Glider

elements.title: Football Manager 2023 In-Game Editor
elements.description: The in-game editor enables the real-time editing of a number of items within Football Manager, such as a player's entire attribute profile, for example. Note: This item can only be used in Football Manager mode.

elements.title: Cities: Skylines - 80's Downtown Beat
elements.description: Feeling the asphalt melting under your feet? Got stuck in a traffic jam? What about stepping on a cramped train? Breathe in the modern City! Put your headphones on and lace up your rollerskates with the 80’s Downtown Beat radio.

elements.title: Cities: Skylines - Content Creator Pack: Heart of Korea
elements.description: Expand your City with Heart of Korea, a fresh, South Korean-inspired Content Creator Pack by Content Creator Elvis. Explore new cityscapes and get inspired by 60 new assets!

elements.title: Cities: Skylines - CCP: Skyscrapers
elements.description:
The only way is up! 
Touch the sky with the “Skyscrapers” Content Creator pack by Feindbold. Enjoy 24 unique skyscrapers and high rises and their 20 variants inspired by iconic buildings from all over the world.

elements.title: Cities: Skylines - K-pop Station
elements.description:
Get in the groove with some K-pop tunes! Straight from South Korea, K-Pop Station arrives to energize your city-management skills.  
K-Pop Station features 16 songs for more than 45 minutes of music!

elements.title: Football Manager 2023 Demo
elements.description: Dynamic, true-to-life management experiences deliver football authenticity like no other game can. You are empowered like never before to develop your managerial prowess and reach elite status.

elements.title: Football Manager 2023
elements.description:
New tools thrust you closer to every aspect of the beautiful game in FM23. Your journey towards soccer glory awaits.
Pre-order for 20% off and Early Access*.

elements.title: Little Inferno: Ho Ho Holiday Edition
elements.description: Ho Ho Humbug! Explore a scary new holiday story, with a fantastic new catalog bursting with wonderful new toys in this exciting expansion to the award winning Little Inferno.

elements.title: Dying Light 2 Stay Human: Dying Laugh Bundle
elements.description: Don a colorful, creepy killer clown costume to put on an unforgettable show. Perform horrific stunts using the Dying Laugh Weapon and the Dying Laugh Paraglider. Let these items act as the perfect means to use all the tricks up your sleeve.

elements.title: Dishonored®: Death of the Outsider™
elements.description: Take on the role of Billie Lurk as she reunites with her old mentor, Daud, to undertake the greatest assassination ever conceived: killing the Outsider, a god-like figure whom they both see as instrumental to some of the Empire's most dishonorable moments.

elements.title: Saturnalia Deluxe Edition
elements.description: Play the survival horror adventure, then discover Saturnalia’s soundtrack, including the extended main theme, and the exclusive digital artbook with more than a hundred illustrations.

elements.title: Dishonored 2
elements.description: Dishonored 2 is set 15 years after the Lord Regent has been vanquished. An otherworldly usurper has seized Empress Emily Kaldwin’s throne. As Emily or Corvo, travel to Karnaca to track down your enemies and take back what’s rightfully yours.

elements.title: Alba - A Wildlife Adventure
elements.description: Even the smallest person can make a big difference. Join Alba, as she sets out to save her beautiful island and its wildlife. And possibly start a revolution.

elements.title: Arcade Paradise - CyberDance EuroMix
elements.description: CyberDance EuroMix is the rave focused follow up to Arcade Paradise’s smash hit dancing sensation, CyberDance - with updated graphics and next generation widescreen technology.

elements.title: Arcade Paradise - Empathy DLC
elements.description: Time to grasp the handles and ascend the mountain whilst avoiding being hit by rocks from unbelievers. The longer you survive the more points you scor

elements.title: Arcade Paradise Coin-Op Pack 1
elements.description: The Arcade Paradise Coin-Op Pack 1 includes the ‘Empathy’, ‘Smoke ‘em’ and ‘CyberDance EuroMix’ DLC packs all in one mega arcade collection.

elements.title: Arcade Paradise - Smoke 'em
elements.description: Aim. Fire. Reload. It’s time to test your sharpshooting skills against the clock in this supremely fun high scoring 2 player shooting range.

elements.title: Fully Loaded Edition
elements.description: Get the most complete WRC Generations experience with the Fully Loaded Edition!

elements.title: WRC Generations
elements.description: Rise to all the challenges of the most comprehensive, realistic and demanding rally simulation ever developed. Dive into the heart of the action and drive the cars from the 2022 WRC championship, including the new hybrid models.

elements.title: Citroën C4 WRC (2010)
elements.description: The most successful car in WRC history. With 3 manufacturers' titles and 4 drivers' titles within a four-year period, it experienced little else except success, thanks to the legendary driver Sébastien Loeb.

elements.title: Porsche 911 GT3 RS RGT Extra Liveries
elements.description: Get 2 additional liveries for the Porsche 911 GT3 RS RGT driven by Romain Dumas in 2015 at the Tour de Corse and Rallye Deutschland.

elements.title: Livery Editor Extra Items
elements.description: Get a pack of 36 exclusive stickers for the Livery Editor and share them with the community.

elements.title: Peugeot 206 WRC (2002)
elements.description: The championship-winning car from 2000 to 2002, it won 24 rallies in this period and was driven by legendary drivers like Marcus Grönholm and Gilles Panizzi.

elements.title: Career Starter Pack
elements.description: Start your career with 6 additional crew cards: Agent, Headhunter, Mechanic, Meteorologist, Engineer and Physio.

elements.title: Dinosaur Deekin Skin & Feat Pack
elements.description: This Idle Champions Skin & Feat pack contains a Champion unlock, 7 gold Champion Chests, and an exclusive skin & feat for that Champion! Take your game to the next level!

elements.title: Dinosaur Asharra Skin & Feat Pack
elements.description: This Idle Champions Skin & Feat pack contains an exclusive skin & feat for a Champion and 7 Gold Supply Chests! Take your game to the next level!

elements.title: Far Realm Evelyn Theme Pack
elements.description: Theme packs contain a Champion unlock, chests, and an exclusive skin & feat for that Champion. They also contain a new familiar that you can assign to certain tasks, such as levelling up Champions, clicking the monsters, or using Ultimates!

elements.title: R-Type Final 2 - DLC Set 9
elements.description: R-Type Final 2 - DLC Set 9 comes with three additional stages. The legendary side-scroller is back and better than ever with beautifully rendered 3D graphics and exhilarating shoot-'em-up gameplay.

elements.title: Warframe: Ember Starter Pack
elements.description: Boost your Arsenal instantly with the new Ember Starter Pack, including a Warframe, Platinum, Weapon and more!

elements.title: 6,250 Doubloons
elements.description: Demonstrating persistence and skill in battle will allow you to research any ship branch without the requirement of financial investment. Doubloons can make playing the game even more enjoyable and help you reach your goals much faster.

elements.title: 3,750 Doubloons
elements.description: Demonstrating persistence and skill in battle will allow you to research any ship branch without the requirement of financial investment. Doubloons can make playing the game even more enjoyable and help you reach your goals much faster.

elements.title: LEGO® Star Wars™: The Skywalker Saga Galactic Edition
elements.description:
Includes full game and 13 Downloadable Character Packs.

Play through all 9 films of the saga and choose from over 400 characters from Andor, Book of Boba Fett, The Clone Wars, Rebels and more!

elements.title: LEGO® Star Wars™: The Skywalker Saga Character Collection 2
elements.description: Expand your collection with 6 new downloadable character packs and play as heroes and villains across the galaxy. More characters, and even more fun!

elements.title: LEGO® Star Wars™: The Skywalker Saga The Clone Wars Character Pack
elements.description: Intergalactic dogfights and defense against Separatist raids aren't the only fun you'll have! Play as veteran heroes and villains from Star Wars: The Clone Wars.

elements.title: LEGO® Star Wars™: The Skywalker Saga Character Collection 1 & 2
elements.description: Expand your LEGO Star Wars Game and get 13 Downloadable Content Packs in Character Collection 1 and 2. Explore the Galaxy with more characters, and more fun!

elements.title: LEGO® Star Wars™: The Skywalker Saga Summer Vacation Character Pack
elements.description: Ahh, a vacation is just what you need from Stormtroopers and TIE Fighters. Celebrate the holidays, LEGO Star Wars style, with iconic characters in their beach wear.

elements.title: MONOPOLY PLUS + MONOPOLY Madness
elements.description: The Ultimate MONOPOLY Experience!

elements.title: Atomicrops: Deerly Beloved
elements.description: It's harvest time down on the farm and we're gearing up to get spoooOOOooooky (please read that in a ghost voice). The Deerly Beloved DLC is the latest, Halloween-themed DLC for Atomicrops with a ton of eerie new additions and upgrades!

elements.title: A Space for the Unbound
elements.description: A slice-of-life adventure game with beautiful pixelart set in the late 90s rural Indonesia that tells a story about overcoming anxiety, depression, and the relationship between a boy and a girl with supernatural powers

elements.title: When the Past was Around
elements.description: When the Past was Around is an adventure point-and-click puzzle game about love, moving on, letting go, and the joy and pain of everything in between.

elements.title: The Legend of Heroes: Trails from Zero
elements.description: When Lloyd Bannings is assigned to Crossbell's Special Support Section, he and his new teammates must prove themselves as they fight to overcome the injustice of a city gripped by corruption.

elements.title: Sackboy™: A Big Adventure – Nathan Drake Costume
elements.description: Leave your mark on the ENTIRE map of Craftworld with the Nathan Drake Costume. Fortune hunting? Check. Globe-trotting? Double check. Epic adventures? Only Sackboy truly knows how.

elements.title: Sackboy™: A Big Adventure – Chloe Frazer Costume
elements.description:
When you’re the fan-favourite thief-for-hire Chloe Frazer, how could you not succeed in plundering your way to the top?!
Dress Sackboy up with this adventure-ready Costume and neither Craftworld, nor Vex, will stand in your way.

elements.title: Sins of a Solar Empire 2
elements.description: Battle for galactic dominance as one of three unique races in a real-time strategy game with unrivaled scale! You’ll explore, expand, exploit, and exterminate through military force, diplomacy, trade, cultural influence, and other underhanded tactics.

elements.title: Sackboy™: A Big Adventure
elements.description:
PlayStation® icon Sackboy bursts into action on PC in a huge 3D multiplayer platforming adventure. 
•	An epic journey stuffed with platforming challenges.
•	Deeply immersive controls.
•	Collaborative, chaotic, and joyful multiplayer fun.

elements.title: Somerville
elements.description: In the wake of catastrophe, you must find the means to make your family whole again. Somerville is a Sci-Fi adventure grounded in the intimate repercussions of a large-scale conflict.

elements.title: GOG GALAXY
elements.description: Discover a hand-picked selection of Good Old Games and great modern releases you can play offline. Create your cross-platform library – launch, play, and manage your games from GOG, Epic Games, and more.

elements.title: FS22 - Porsche Diesel Junior 108
elements.description: Get the Porsche Diesel Junior 108, a red-painted classic and probably the most popular Porsche tractor of all time - digitized true to the original!

elements.title: Pathfinder: Wrath of the Righteous – Season Pass 2
elements.description: Embark on new adventures in this follow-up to the first season! New friends and enemies, dangers and rewards await you — both as extensions of the main campaign and as standalone experiences.

elements.title: Train Sim World® 3: New Journeys CSX SD40
elements.description: Bring back the origins of CSX, take on new challenges and explore more on Sand Patch Grade with Train Sim World 2: New Journeys - CSX SD40.

elements.title: Train Sim World® 3: New Journeys Silver 1972 Stock
elements.description: Relive the classic days of the Underground, take on new challenges and explore more on Bakerloo Line with Train Sim World 2: New Journeys – Silver 1972 Stock.

elements.title: Train Sim World® 3: New Journeys S-Bahn Koln BR 423
elements.description: Get to work on the bustling Köln S-Bahn, take on new challenges and explore more on Schnellfahrstrecke Köln - Aachen with Train Sim World 2: New Journeys – S-Bahn Köln BR 423.

elements.title: The Long Dark: Tales from the Far Territory
elements.description: The first paid Expansion for the award-winning survival experience, THE LONG DARK. Explore the vast and mysterious Far Territory, deep in the heart of Great Bear. Extract its dark secrets. Navigate its treacherous Regions. And most of all: strive to survive.

elements.title: Fall Guys - Crow Pack
elements.description: This'll give you something to crow about! Bundle Includes: Crow Costume (Upper and Lower) 600 x Show-Bucks. Show-Bucks are an in-game currency you can use to buy in-game items that customise different aspects of your Fall Guy!

elements.title: Paragon: The Overprime
elements.description: Paragon : The Overprime is a team-based TPS MOBA game.

elements.title: Anime Legends Pack
elements.description: Reimagine your reality with the Anime Legends. Prepare for the next encounter by gathering your gear, including:  3 Outfits, 3 Back Blings, 3 Pickaxes and an Emote.

elements.title: Gotham Knights: Visionary Pack
elements.description: Get the Visionary Pack to expand your cosmetic experience. The Visionary Pack includes the Exclusive ‘’Knightwatch by Jim Lee’’ Transmog, Beyond Suitstyle, Salvaging, Boosted Gear, 3 Suit Colorways, and an exclusive Emote.

elements.title: Gotham Knights
elements.description: Batman is dead. It is now up to the Batman Family - Batgirl, Nightwing, Red Hood, and Robin - to protect Gotham City.

elements.title: Gotham Knights: Deluxe
elements.description: The Gotham Knights Deluxe Edition includes the main game and Visionary Pack.

elements.title: RimWorld Biotech DLC
elements.description: Control mechanoids, raise a family with children, and play with genetic modifications. Fight or ally with xenohuman factions and explore the dark secrets of the blood-drinkers.

elements.title: New Tales from the Borderlands: Deluxe Edition
elements.description: Decide the fates of altruistic scientist Anu, her ambitious, "streetwise" brother Octavio, and the fierce, frogurt-slinging Fran. Claw and con your way through five thrilling chapters!

elements.title: New Tales from the Borderlands
elements.description: Decide the fates of altruistic scientist Anu, her ambitious, "streetwise" brother Octavio, and the fierce, frogurt-slinging Fran. Claw and con your way through five thrilling chapters!

elements.title: Deponia: Full Scrap Collection
elements.description:
Huzzah, all 4 Deponia games combined!

Rufus's homeworld Deponia is a planet-sized junkyard. When the beautiful Elysian girl Goal falls into his arms – quite literally – Rufus' dream to leave Deponia seems to be within arm's reach as well.

elements.title: The Division 2 – One-Time Offer Pack (2,000 + 1,000 Bonus Credits + Bonus Outfit)
elements.description: Take advantage of this one-time offer and receive 3,000 Premium Credits (including 1,000 Bonus), plus one Bonus Outfit.

elements.title: Los Panteros American Muscle Bundle
elements.description: Pummel your enemies in style with this customized heavy duty gear.

elements.title: Saints Criminal Customs
elements.description: The Saints Criminal Customs includes two specially adorned bonus items; the elaborately styled Saints Custom Convertible and the equally signature Saints Custom Stab Jacket.

elements.title: Idols Anarchy Pack
elements.description: Don the iconic digitized DJ Helmet to light up your enemies faces before smashing them unconscious with the Idols Twinkle Bat, all to the sound of broken glass, before speeding off on your stolen neon-illuminated Sandstorm Scrambler bike.

elements.title: For Honor® Kensei Hero Skin
elements.description: Become a demon hunter and wield the Mamono Dagger with this full body customization for Kensei, Yokai Slayer Meiko.

elements.title: The Jackbox Party Pack 9
elements.description: Save your next party! 5 new games in 1 Party Pack: the trivia bluff-off Fibbage 4, the team test Quixort, the joke auction Junktopia, the silly guessfest Nonsensory and the reality TV game Roomerang.

elements.title: Spelljammer Kent Theme Pack
elements.description: Theme packs contain a Champion unlock, chests, and an exclusive skin & feat for that Champion. They also contain a new familiar that you can assign to certain tasks, such as levelling up Champions, clicking the monsters, or using Ultimates!

elements.title: Spelljammer D'hani Skin & Feat Pack
elements.description: This Idle Champions Skin & Feat pack contains a Champion unlock, 7 gold Champion Chests, and an exclusive skin & feat for that Champion! Take your game to the next level!

elements.title: UNCHARTED™: Legacy of Thieves Collection
elements.description:
Are You Ready To Seek Your Fortune?

UNCHARTED: Legacy of Thieves Collection includes the two remastered, critically-acclaimed, globe-trotting single player adventures from UNCHARTED 4: A Thief’s End and UNCHARTED: The Lost Legacy

elements.title: Mysterious Misadventures of Mollie and Mordecai
elements.description: One tragic Halloween, Mordecai is captured by an Evil Wizard and must rely on Mollie's help to exit the Twisted Estate! Transformed by Magic into Dolls, they’ll use their Unique Skills and Level Up while encountering Enemies, Puzzles and More on this Epic Adventure!

elements.title: Assassin's Creed Chronicles: India
elements.description:
Embody Arbaaz in his quest for retribution through a colourful depiction of Colonial India in 2.5D stealth gameplay. 

• Travel across an amazing 19th Century India and its legendary landmarks. 
• Experience the thrill of a stealthy assassin with a unique set of skills and weapons such as the double kill moves and the chakram.
• Discover a brand new mode with stealth, speed and assassination rooms

elements.title: Assassin's Creed Chronicles: China
elements.description:
Exact Shao Jun’s vengeance on the Chinese Emperor in stunning 16th century China with fresh 2.5D stealth gameplay:

• Embody a stealthy Assassin with unique combat skills and gear like the Shoe Blade and the Rope Dart
• Discover the story of Shao Jun, the last remaining Assassin of the Chinese Brotherhood
• Dive into a beautiful Chinese setting by travelling across the great empire of China

elements.title: Assassin's Creed Chronicles – Trilogy
elements.description: Assassin's Creed Chronicles – Trilogy

elements.title: Assassin's Creed Chronicles: Russia
elements.description:
Join Nikolaï Orelov in his search for redemption as you journey through an iconic, propaganda art style Russia in 2.5D gameplay.  
• Survive the aftermath of October Revolution & travel accross Russia.
• Experience the thrill of being a stealthy Assassin in an exclusive modern setting.
• Switch between two playable characters: use Nikolaï & Anastasia’s unique playstyles.

elements.title: Ghostbusters: Spirits Unleashed
elements.description: Hunting or haunting! The choice is yours in the upcoming asymmetrical Ghostbusters game from IllFonic, Ghostbusters: Spirits Unleashed. Play with up to four friends or solo on multiple platforms.

elements.title: Going Commando Cosmetic Pack
elements.description: Steal in style with a new Commando Boss outfit and tactical weapon, and give those explosive heists a touch of class!

elements.title: Chicken Dinner Cosmetic Pack
elements.description: Everyone’s a winner with this calorie-tastic Cosmetic Pack celebrating one of Santo Ileso’s finest eateries!

elements.title: Saints Row Expansion Pass
elements.description:
The Saints Row Expansion Pass gives access to three expansion episodes.

With each expansion, new areas of the game world are opened up, featuring a wealth of new gameplay content to discover.

elements.title: Surviving the Aftermath: Shattered Hope
elements.description: The Moon is shattered. Broken. Lost in the vast space above planet Earth. What was once a beacon of hope in the sky has now left survivors to deal with a new, catastrophic void in “Shattered Hope”.

elements.title: A Plague Tale: Requiem - Protector Pack DLC
elements.description: Get the Protector Pack to set out on the right foot in the next chapter of Amicia’s and Hugo’s journey, with bonus crafting materials, extra cosmetics for Amicia and an exclusive crossbow skin.

elements.title: A Plague Tale: Requiem
elements.description: Following from the first, award-winning adventure, embark with Amicia and her brother Hugo on an intense new quest for hope, as a terrifying curse hunts them down.

elements.title: Fall Guys - Pegwin Party Pack
elements.description: Grab this bundle to make every Round a Pegwin Pursuit! Includes: Pegwinner (Whole Costume), Pegwinging It (Whole Costume), Pegwhimsy (Whole Costume), and 1000 x Show-Bucks!

elements.title: Fall Guys - Doc Glover Pack
elements.description: Grab your next crown in style with this handy bundle! Includes: Doc Glover (Whole Costume) and 600 x Show-Bucks!

elements.title: Scorn
elements.description: Scorn

elements.title: Lost Eidolons Digital Deluxe
elements.description: Experience Artemesia to the Fullest! Enjoy Lost Eidolons, its beautiful soundtrack, and its stunning artwork with this digital deluxe bundle.

elements.title: Fallout 3: Game of the Year Edition
elements.description:
Prepare for the Future™
Experience the most acclaimed game of 2008 like never before with Fallout 3: Game of the Year Edition. Create a character of your choosing and descend into a post-apocalyptic world where every minute is a fight for survival

elements.title: SnowRunner - Season 8: Grand Harvest
elements.description:
This product is included in the Year 2 Pass for SnowRunner.

After a streak of crop failures and poor harvests, operate three new vehicles to restore sustainable farming activities and alternative energy sources in the new expansion, Grand Harvest.

elements.title: SnowRunner - Rezvani Hercules
elements.description:
Expand your SnowRunner garage further with the Rezvani Hercules, a high-performance 6-wheel Scout truck with a fierce and unique modern look.

Not included in the Year 1 Pass or Year 2 Pass.

elements.title: Razer Cortex
elements.description: Improve your system performance and visuals, framerate, load times, and more. Includes a price comparison tool for PC games. All of this and more in one powerful platform.

elements.title: Wave the Space Eel Familiar Pack
elements.description: Familiar packs contain an exclusive familiar, as well as a collection of potions that can help you progress further and faster! Familiars are NPCs that you can assign to certain tasks, such as levelling up Champions, clicking the monsters, or using Ultimates.

elements.title: Space Clown Sisaspia Skin & Feat Pack
elements.description: This Idle Champions Skin & Feat pack contains a Champion unlock, 7 gold Champion Chests, and an exclusive skin & feat for that Champion! Take your game to the next level!

elements.title: PC Building Simulator 2
elements.description: Grow your empire as you learn to repair, build and customize PCs at the next level. Experience deeper simulation, an upgraded career mode, and powerful new customisation features. Use realistic parts from 40+ hardware brands to bring your ultimate PC to life.

elements.title: Front to Back Cosmetic Pack
elements.description: Your enemies won't know if you're coming or going with this Cosmetic Pack including the multi-sided Hollybird car, Cowboy Hat and Cowboy Boots!

elements.title: Spelljammer Strix Theme Pack
elements.description: Theme packs contain a Champion unlock, chests, and an exclusive skin & feat for that Champion. They also contain a new familiar that you can assign to certain tasks, such as levelling up Champions, clicking the monsters, or using Ultimates!

elements.title: Spelljammer Walnut Skin & Feat Pack
elements.description: This Idle Champions Skin & Feat pack contains a Champion unlock, 7 gold Champion Chests, and an exclusive skin & feat for that Champion! Take your game to the next level!

elements.title: Spelljammer Evelyn Skin & Feat Pack
elements.description: This Idle Champions Skin & Feat pack contains a Champion unlock, 7 gold Champion Chests, and an exclusive skin & feat for that Champion! Take your game to the next level!

elements.title: Democracy 4 - Country Pack
elements.description:
Democracy 4 - Country pack adds six new countries to the game for you to govern:

- Greece
- Ireland
- Switzerland
- Poland
- Turkey
- Brazil

Each country has its own challenges and problems to deal with!

elements.title: TIDAL Music
elements.description: Elevate your music streaming experience with TIDAL to experience over 90 million tracks and over 450,000 videos in premium sound formats like HiFi or Master Quality Authenticated (MQA)

elements.title: SuperPower 3
elements.description: Superpower 3 is a modern geopolitical sim in a planet Earth setup. Rule the world or challenge your knowledge about demography, economics, military strategy, as well as political issues across the globe.

elements.title: World of Warships — Starter Pack: Ishizuchi
elements.description: Have you just started out on your way in World of Warships? Dip your toes in the water with a Premium battleship and a set of sweet bonuses.

elements.title: HUMANKIND™ Heritage Collection
elements.description:
The HUMANKIND™ Heritage Collection includes: 
- HUMANKIND™ Main Game
- Cultures of Latin America DLC
- Cultures of Africa DLC
- Notre-Dame Pack
- HUMANKIND™ - Digital Deluxe Upgrade

elements.title: ToeJam & Earl: Back in the Groove!
elements.description:
ToeJam & Earl: Back in the Groove is a mash-up of the best features from the classic console games with a ton of funky fresh improvements.

Relive the original roguelike game with new 4 player online and local co-op, crazy Earthlings, weird presents and aliens from Funkotron!

elements.title: Need for Speed™ Unbound Standard Edition
elements.description: Pre-purchase* Need for Speed™ Unbound Standard Edition and get exclusive Unbound items: Driving Effect,  License Plate,  Banner Artwork and Sticker and $150,000 Bank (Multiplayer use only)

elements.title: Need for Speed™ Unbound Palace Edition
elements.description: Pre-purchase* Need for Speed™ Unbound Palace Edition and get 3 days early access plus exclusive Palace branded content  including 4 stunningly intense custom cars, driving effects, and das just the start.

elements.title: The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim Anniversary Edition
elements.description: The Anniversary Edition includes a decade worth of content: the critically acclaimed core game, pre-existing and new Creation Club content, plus all three official add-ons: Dawnguard, Hearthfire, and Dragonborn.

elements.title: The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim Anniversary Upgrade
elements.description: The Anniversary Upgrade includes pre-existing and new Creation Club content like quests, dungeons, bosses, weapons, spells, and more. With Creations, there is a lot more to discover. You must own Skyrim Special Edition to access this content.

elements.title: The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim Special Edition
elements.description: Winner of more than 200 Game of the Year Awards, The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim Special Edition includes the full base game and all its add-on expansions, plus modern enhancements like remastered art and visual effects, volumetric god rays and more.

elements.title: Prison Architect - Undead
elements.description: Undead brings a whole new scenario to Prison Architect: one where the only objective is to survive! With this new, spooky, expansion wardens will have to fight off the undead attacks to save their inmates and free the prison from an unprecedented catastrophe.

elements.title: Warframe: Revenant Prime Access - Accessories Pack
elements.description: Access Exclusive Prime Gear for a Limited Time with the Prime Accessories Pack!

elements.title: Warframe: Revenant Prime Access - Danse Macabre
elements.description: Add the latest Prime Warframe, Weapons, and exclusive Accessories to your Arsenal instantly.

elements.title: Warframe: Revenant Prime Access - Reave Pack
elements.description: Add the latest Prime Warframe, Weapons, and exclusive Accessories to your Arsenal instantly.

elements.title: Warframe: Revenant Prime Access - Mesmer Skin Pack
elements.description: Make the newest Prime Weapons yours instantly. The Mesmer Skin Pack includes 1050 Platinum, Phantasma Prime and Tatsu Prime.
